#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>
#include <set>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n;unsigned long long m;scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %lld",&n,&m);
		unsigned long long num=1,den=1;
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			num+=den;
			den+=num;
			num = num%m;
			den = den%m;
		}
		cout<<num%m<<'/'<<den%m<<endl;
	}
}
